title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Jets W, Nickname Origins
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Jets W, Nickname Origins
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why he’s more locked into college football than he has been in a long time, and why no one should be outraged over Bills OC Ken Dorsey’s coaching box implosions during Buffalo’s last second loss.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin for his first ever appearance after a win to discuss the weight lifted with their Week 3 win over the Jets (16:00), if he was surprised to see Tee Higgins’ make his freakish circus catch (22:00), his experience competing against Tua (25:00), why he can relate to Justin Herbert playing hurt (27:00), why he’s goes dark on social media during the season (29:00), what he saw from his first game against Jets rookie CB Sauce Gardner (33:00), the origin of some of his many nicknames (35:00), if he’s still fooled by pre-snap defensive looks (41:00), why there’s more trash talk in divisional games (43:00), and why he lost his temper in the AFC Championship game against the Chiefs (45:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
